name: Kamino
description:
Over the last 5 years we have established long-term partner- ships with companies from the UK, the US, Germany and other EU countries. With our ecosystem of specialized partners, a PREMIUM iOS and Android experience for your users is guaranteed.
The bond between technology and people is essential. Our work is our mission: we are devoted and meticulous, because we know that in order for technology to empower people, it needs to work. We listen to you, we validate how to bring your idea to reality, we adapt to you, we create, we grow together.
